recipe.title: Cheese-Stuffed Cauliflower Nuggets Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: In a bowl, mash the cauliflower until slightly combined.
Add the egg, ¾ cup (90 g) bread crumbs, salt, pepper, garlic powder, and parsley, and mix with a fork until combined. Chill for 10 minutes.
Form the mixture into nuggets with a cube of cheddar cheese in the center. Pack them tightly.
Roll each nugget in flour, then egg, then bread crumbs. Place on a baking sheet covered in parchment paper.
Bake for 18-20 minutes, flipping the nuggets halfway through. Brush with oil for browner nuggets.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a bowl, mash the cauliflower until slightly combined.
Add the egg, ¾ cup (90 g) bread crumbs, salt, pepper, garlic powder, and parsley, and mix with a fork until combined.
Form the mixture into nuggets with a cube of cheddar cheese in the center.
Roll each nugget in flour, then egg, then bread crumbs.
Place on a baking sheet covered in parchment paper.
Bake for 18-20 minutes, flipping the nuggets halfway through.
Brush with oil for browner nuggets.
